Literature.Title: LC-AMP-I1, a novel venom-derived antimicrobial peptide from the wolf spider Lycosa coelestis
Literature.Author: Wang J, Liu X, Song Y, Liu Z, Tang X, Tan H

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human embryonic kidney HEK293T cells:10% Cytotoxicity=20 µM,Rabbit erythrocytes:<10% Hemolysis=80 µM,Rabbit erythrocytes:10.13% Hemolysis=320 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Salmonella typhimurium CGMCC 1.1174(MIC=2.5µM),Escherichia coli CCTCCC AB 2018675(MIC=5µM),Shigella dysenteriae CGMCC 1.1869(MIC=2.5µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CGMCC 1.596(MIC=5µM),Staphylococcus aureus CMCC 26003(MIC=5µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=5µM),Enterococcus faecium(MIC=2.5-5µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=5µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=10µM),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=5-10µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=5-10µM),Escherichia coli(MIC=5µM),Escherichia coli CCTCCC AB 2018675(LC=20µM),Staphylococcus aureus CMCC 26003(LC=40µM),Mouse breast cancer 4T1(IC50=19.58µM),Human hepatocellular carcinoma HepG2(10-20% Cytotoxicity=20µM),Human Nasopharyngeal carcinoma HONE-1(no activity data),Escherichia coli CCTCCC AB 2018675(MIC=10µM),Escherichia coli CCTCCC AB 2018675(MIC=20µM),Staphylococcus aureus CMCC 26003(MIC=10µM)
